EzyFit Function Reference<< Prev | Next >> 
swx
LIN<->LOG swap of the X axis

Description 
swx swaps the X axis of the current plot between linear and log 
coordinates.
See Also 
swy, sw. 
 
Published output in the Help browser 
   showdemo swx

 Previous: swNext: swy
